name: Codel
description: A fully autonomous AI agent capable of performing complex tasks and projects using terminal, browser, and editor interfaces.
author: semanser

name: Changelog
description: An agent that generates a nicely formatted markdown changelog from the changes in a git repository.
author: Simone Margaritelli <evilsocket@gmail.com>

name: Devika
description: An Agentic AI Software Engineer that comprehends human instructions, decomposes them into steps, researches relevant information, and writes code to fulfill the given objective.
author: stitionai

name: Code Audit
description: An agent that audits the code of a project for security vulnerabilities.
author: Simone Margaritelli <evilsocket@gmail.com>

name: Pwnagotchi
description: An AI-powered agent designed for passive WiFi handshake capture using reinforcement learning, optimized for WiFi pentesting and educational purposes.
author: Simone Margaritelli <evilsocket@gmail.com>

name: Ownagotchi
description: An agent for personal network security monitoring, detecting WiFi attacks, rogue access points, and suspicious LAN activity using bettercap.
author: Simone Margaritelli <evilsocket@gmail.com>
